In early May, heavy rains caused widespread flooding throughout the southern Brazilian state of Rio Grande du Sol. On behalf of the Hard Rock Heals Foundation, Hard Rock International and BrazilFoundation board member & President of Banco Master Daniel Vorcaro will be donating $250K to the @BrazilFound in partnership with the Luz Alliance Fund to help provide the region with the resources they need to rebuild and recover while also providing critical humanitarian aid- focusing on rescue efforts, water, food, medicine and sanitary supplies. Head to our link in bio to learn how you can help. #HardRock #LoveAllServeAll #AllIsOne
